			<title>Protect Your Social Security Number with Kevin Roundy</title>
			<itunes:title>Protect Your Social Security Number with Kevin Roundy</itunes:title>
			<pubDate>Wed, 02 Nov 2022 10:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
			<guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[fff5baac-46c5-4241-8822-b709bf42523a]]></guid>
			<link><![CDATA[https://www.easyprey.com/140]]></link>
			<description><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Once a data breach has taken place, your data can be sold and resold and resold again. It’s important to know how to proactively protect your personal information. Today’s guest is Kevin Roundy. Dr. Roundy received his Ph.D. from the University of Wisconsin where he developed tools by which malware can be analyzed both with detailed statistical analysis techniques and dynamic instrumentation. He has collaboratively developed threat detection tools and has offered several research publications and patents. He also has a background in machine learning and database systems. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Show Notes:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[0:56] - Kevin shares his current role and why he has become passionate about keeping people safe from scammers.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[2:45] - Oftentimes, scammers take advantage of current events and news stories.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[4:02] - Student loan forgiveness is a recent trend in scams as it is a current focus in the US.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[5:06] - Don’t click the ads that pop up at the top of your search as scammers will pay money to have their ad placed there.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[6:01] - Kevin shares the common things scammers will say to target those looking for student loan forgiveness.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[7:20] - Scammers can also just take your information and use it to claim unemployment.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[8:50] - Kevin shares some things to help protect your social security number.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[11:47] - There are great opportunities to protect yourself and get to these things before someone else does.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[12:44] - If a company is breached and they lose your information, they are legally required to notify you so keep your contact information updated.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[13:50] - We do not have the best practices with passwords.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[15:06] - It’s not possible to have unique passwords that you can memorize.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[16:56] - Dark web monitoring is very effective and fast.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[17:50] - There are times in the past when your information could have hit the dark web before anyone knew there was a breach.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[19:24] - The price of things on the dark web may indicate the level of security your account has.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[22:22] - It’s annoying to have to work with two factor authentication, but it is worth it.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[24:38] - How do we have conversations with family members to educate them without sounding demeaning?</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[26:58] - When it comes to having conversations with children, the earlier the better.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[31:43] - It’s important to keep lines of communication open with your kids about security and privacy.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[33:23] - When it comes to having a phone, Kevin has guidelines for his kids.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[35:40] - Once you put something out there, it’s out there forever.</span></li> </ul> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Thanks for joining us on Easy Prey. Be sure to</span> <a href= "https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/easy-prey/id1488678905"><span style="font-weight: 400;"> subscribe to our podcast on iTunes</span></a> <span style= "font-weight: 400;">and leave a nice review. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Links and Resources:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.easyprey.com/"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Podcast Web Page</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.facebook.com/EasyPreyPodcast"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Facebook Page</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://whatismyipaddress.com/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">whatismyipaddress.com</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.instagram.com/easypreypodcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Instagram</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://twitter.com/easypreypodcast"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Twitter</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.linkedin.com/company/easy-prey-podcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on LinkedIn</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCgy_xKrjiXghSgGFEAFdTQ"><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Easy Prey on YouTube</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.pinterest.com/easypreypodcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Pinterest</span></a></li> </ul>]]></description>

			<title>Keeping Children Safe Online with Titania Jordan</title>
			<itunes:title>Keeping Children Safe Online with Titania Jordan</itunes:title>
			<pubDate>Wed, 26 Oct 2022 10:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
			<guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[0b6b4ed6-0806-420f-b590-4bf198a039d7]]></guid>
			<link><![CDATA[https://www.easyprey.com/139]]></link>
			<description><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Online predators can pretend to be anyone, any age, anywhere. We need to educate and empower our children to stay safe on their devices and not become victims. Today’s guest is Titania Jordan. Titania is the Chief Marketing Officer and Chief Parent Officer at Bark Technologies, an online safety company that helps keep kids safe online and in real life. Titania has contributed pieces to the Wall Street Journal, Forbes, Huffington Post, Fox Business, Daily Mail, USA Today, Vogue, and more. Her first book</span> <em><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Parenting in a Tech World</span></em> <span style="font-weight: 400;">was published in 2020 and quickly became a best seller on Amazon. She was also featured in the 2020 documentary</span> <em><span style="font-weight: 400;">Childhood 2.0.</span></em> <span style="font-weight: 400;">She frequently appears as a subject matter expert on nationally broadcast programs such as Today Show, Steve Harvey, CBS This Morning, Good Morning America, and many others.</span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Show Notes:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[1:14] - Titania shares her background and why she was drawn to her field.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[3:07] - In her history, Titania has many childhood traumas and wants to help protect others.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[5:18] - Kids have access to everything that’s good but also everything that is bad and parents did not have that experience in their own childhood.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[7:41] - Kids are being exposed to everything more frequently and at a younger age than ever in history.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[9:50] - Parents can feel helpless because there is a fine line between controlling what their children access online and giving them the freedom to use it.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[11:37] - 			<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Online predators can pretend to be anyone, any age, anywhere. We need to educate and empower our children to stay safe on their devices and not become victims. Today’s guest is Titania Jordan. Titania is the Chief Marketing Officer and Chief Parent Officer at Bark Technologies, an online safety company that helps keep kids safe online and in real life. Titania has contributed pieces to the Wall Street Journal, Forbes, Huffington Post, Fox Business, Daily Mail, USA Today, Vogue, and more. Her first book <em>Parenting in a Tech World</em> was published in 2020 and quickly became a best seller on Amazon. She was also featured in the 2020 documentary <em>Childhood 2.0.</em> She frequently appears as a subject matter expert on nationally broadcast programs such as Today Show, Steve Harvey, CBS This Morning, Good Morning America, and many others.</p> Show Notes: <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[1:14] - 			<title>Protecting Your Identity with Patrick Glennon</title>
			<itunes:title>Protecting Your Identity with Patrick Glennon</itunes:title>

			<description><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Taking online quizzes can be fun and entertaining. Clicking on links in emails and DMs is just plain convenient. Unfortunately, both of these can put your identity at risk for theft. Today’s guest is Patrick Glennon. Patrick has over 20 years of experience in banking and consumer identity protection with roles at companies including JP Morgan Chase, Core Logic, Arthur Anderson, and eBates. He has built software and infrastructure teams from the ground up, managed not only data center cloud migrations, but also managed transitions from legacy to modern engineering standards.</span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Show Notes:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[0:55] - Patrick shares his background and his current role at IdentityIQ.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[2:15] - We are putting more and more of our personal information online.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[4:06] - Credit card numbers can be used for more than purchasing things with your funds.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[6:06] - There is a wide variety of ways people can use your identity and every day there seem to be new ones.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[8:06] - When something happens once, the same information can be used across platforms and accounts.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[9:26] - Online quizzes can be used in surprising ways.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[10:52] - There is some organization to the ways scammers take information.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[14:56] - There’s nothing we can do to prevent people from trying. But there are many things we can do to help prevent them from being successful.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[16:08] - Mix it up and use different security questions on different sites.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[17:48] - Don’t click on links in emails or texts.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[19:09] - Shred personal mail and credit card offers from the mail.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[21:44] - Your information is probably out there.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[23:12] - There are so many ways people can get information and then have full access to tons of things.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[24:47] - If one thing is compromised, assume that everything is and take the steps to stop access.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[26:54] - Depending on what happens, it could take weeks or even months to have this resolved.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[28:57] - Time is a big loss for many victims, but there is also an emotional toll.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[30:53] - Move to authenticator apps rather than text message two factor authentication.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[32:12] - Young people will have a harder time recovering from identity theft.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[33:13] - You don’t just want to be educated for your sake.</span></li> </ul> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Thanks for joining us on Easy Prey. Be sure to</span> <a href= "https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/easy-prey/id1488678905"><span style="font-weight: 400;"> subscribe to our podcast on iTunes</span></a> <span style= "font-weight: 400;">and leave a nice review. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Links and Resources:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= 			<title>Investigating Cybercrime with Anthony van der Meer</title>
			<itunes:title>Investigating Cybercrime with Anthony van der Meer</itunes:title>
			<pubDate>Wed, 12 Oct 2022 10:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
			<guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[fd8d8db5-e670-4e50-9dab-95d95a64dcd0]]></guid>
			<link><![CDATA[https://www.easyprey.com/137]]></link>
			<description><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">It is fascinating to see an investigation using dark web technology showing how criminal syndicates work and the process stolen equipment goes through. Today’s guest is Anthony van der Meer. Anthony is a Dutch investigative journalist and filmmaker. As a filmmaker, he has been focusing on the dark side of the digital world since 2015. For his investigations, he dives deep into the world of cyber criminals by infiltrating using OSINT and ethical hacking. He was recently a speaker at the Global Online Spam Summit on the dark web and cyber crime. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Show Notes:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[0:55] - Anthony shares his background and what he does in his current role.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[2:12] - While working in film, he realized he really liked documentary and investigative work.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[3:42] - Hacking is doing something different with a product than it’s originally designed or intended for.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[5:21] - Anthony describes an experience of his phone being stolen and it was done in a very professional and organized way.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[7:24] - 			<title>Pig Butchering with Jane Lee</title>
			<itunes:title>Pig Butchering with Jane Lee</itunes:title>

			<guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[056a37f9-b40b-45fa-800a-35419096c421]]></guid>

			<description><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">We’ve all heard of dating scams, but realizing that most of them are part of larger criminal organizations working 24/7 to manipulate and defraud you can be a bit shocking. Today’s guest is Jane Lee. Jane is a Trust and Safety Architect at Sift who specializes in malicious websites, spam, misinformation, account content abuse, and payment risk. Prior to joining Sift, she was on the fraud teams at Facebook and Square and also spent some time as a private investigator. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Show Notes:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[1:08] - Part of Jane’s responsibility at Sift is to understand new and emerging fraud trends.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[2:36] - Jane gets to do the detective work she likes but in a more physically safe tech environment.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[3:46] - Pig butchering scams are similar to romance scams but more advanced.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[4:25] - Scammers start on dating apps and move targets to another form of messaging.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[6:36] - It’s called pig butchering by the scammers.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[7:34] - As a dating app user, Jane noticed patterns and decided to investigate.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[9:29] - Jane shares the trends in the profile photos and images on dating accounts.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[11:58] - Over time, it is easy to see patterns in profiles.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[13:55] - Using IP emulators is common for scammers.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[15:47] - Machines are better at detecting patterns than the naked human eye.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[17:26] - Fraud is largely agnostic.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[18:58] - It is the same dance but with different “flavors”.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[20:49] - Moving over to another messaging system is one red flag. After that, love-bombing is another common indicator.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[23:07] - Covid has given scammers another reasonable excuse for them to use about not being able to meet in person.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[24:22] - These types of scammers also talk about investments and even screenshots of bank accounts.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[26:46] - To compensate for grammar and language errors, these scammers will mention that they were born overseas.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[28:50] - These scammers also may have a fake crypto exchange platform.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[30:22] - Jane describes the experience of interacting with the “tech help” line of a fake crypto platform.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[35:27] - Jane shares that a lot of these scammers are coming out of Southeast Asia.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[36:34] - There is a very sophisticated fraud economy.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[39:35] - Deep fake technology is getting more and more advanced.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[42:15] - What is synthetic identity fraud?</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[43:55] - It is necessary to have a little less trust in people you talk to online.</span></li> </ul> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Thanks for joining us on Easy Prey. 			<title>4 Levels of Human Factor Security with Roy Zur</title>
			<itunes:title>4 Levels of Human Factor Security with Roy Zur</itunes:title>
			<pubDate>Wed, 28 Sep 2022 10:00:15 +0000</pubDate>
			<guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[8a0990d4-1db2-4e37-a0e0-2bf372b7bff6]]></guid>
			<link><![CDATA[https://www.easyprey.com/135]]></link>
			<description><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Many believe that cybersecurity is for high tech professionals only. It’s important to know that employees at</span> <em><span style= "font-weight: 400;">every</span></em> <span style= "font-weight: 400;">level can accidentally open the door to your network. Today’s guest is Roy Zur. Roy is the founder and CEO of Thrive DX for Enterprise which is a global education company committed to transforming lives through digital skills training and solutions as well as addressing the human factor of cybersecurity training. Roy is a 15 year veteran of the Israeli Defense Force where he served as a major. Roy also serves as the adjunct professor in Risk Management and Cybersecurity. He is the founder and chairman of the non-profit Israeli Institute for Policy and Legislation and a member of the Forbes Business Council.</span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Show Notes:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[1:05] - Roy shares his background in cybersecurity and the different responsibilities he’s had.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[2:27] - Roy describes the challenges experienced in the Israeli Defense Force.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[3:55] - It’s not just about the training, it’s also about the screening.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[6:30] - The rapid changes in cyber security makes maintaining the curriculum a challenge.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[9:13] - When finding people that qualify as candidates for this learning, there is a lot to learn. Roy describes parts of the program.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[11:47] - Many people are afraid of cyber security because it seems so complicated, but it is more of a human factor issue.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[13:08] - There are different groups within an organization that have access to data.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[14:34] - Roy defines the groups or levels of an organization.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[16:11] - Software developers and engineers have a huge responsibility.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[17:08] - Each group has to have an education about security and the type of skills they need will vary.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[18:47] - The method of learning is also different per level.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[20:21] - Giving employees the information they need and nothing more is crucial so they can spend their time working on their responsibilities.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[22:12] - Training for awareness which usually includes everyone in an organization takes about 2 hours a year but people don’t always take it seriously.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[24:11] - Phishing simulations are very effective. 			<title>15 Ways to Prevent Financial Exploitation with Cameron Huddleston</title>
			<itunes:title>15 Ways to Prevent Financial Exploitation with Cameron Huddleston</itunes:title>
			<pubDate>Wed, 21 Sep 2022 10:00:31 +0000</pubDate>
			<guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[1e67b8c6-2990-486b-be09-ecb95115639e]]></guid>
			<link><![CDATA[https://www.easyprey.com/134]]></link>
			<description><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Talking to our aging parents about their finances can be a tough conversation. But there are ways to educate and protect our parents from being taken advantage of by scammers, charities, and other organizations without being seen as controlling or overstepping. </span></p> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Today’s guest is Cameron Huddleston. Cameron is an author, speaker, and award-winning financial journalist. She’s the Director of Education and Content at Careful, the first service built to protect and monitor aging adults’ daily finances. Cameron’s work has appeared in a number of publications including Forbes and The Chicago Tribune.</span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Show Notes:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[1:09] - Cameron described the experience of caring for her mother with alzheimers. She had not had a conversation with her about her finances.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[2:37] - Talking to your parents about scammers is a way to open the door to more conversation about finances.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[5:13] - Warn your parents about red flags because there’s no way you can keep them updated on every single scam.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[6:29] - As we age, we all experience some level of cognitive decline.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[7:38] - Get an idea of how they are doing now so that you will be more aware of changes.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[8:56] - You’re not trying to pry or be nosey. This is a series of conversations that open the door to communication about finances for the future.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[10:00] - Older adults are more likely to be exploited by someone they know.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[11:10] - Nothing has to happen right now except the beginnings of conversations. Cameron lists some things to have in order later.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[13:07] - There are things you can do to help prevent a caretaker from taking advantage of your parents.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[14:35] - There are some red flags to listen for in conversations with your aging parents and/or their caretaker.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[15:43] - If you are concerned about your parent’s credit or finances, you can have their credit frozen and you can monitor everything for safety.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[16:58] - Your parents can also sign up for services while they are healthy and add you to the monitoring account for notifications.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[18:39] - Cameron shares an experience with her own mother. She was a giving person but with her alzheimers, she wound up donating money frequently.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[19:51] - How can you help them get the spending on charity donations under control?</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[22:21] - One piece of advice for parents is to let all calls go to voicemail and don’t call the numbers they called from.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[24:21] - Chris describes an unusual and suspicious new text scam. How can we warn parents about the things that are out of the norm?</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[27:00] - If you have a parent with dementia, these warnings won’t always do much good. Leave notes and reminders for them.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[28:26] - Cameron describes a situation with her mother and she realized that she was no longer safe to live alone.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[31:09] - There are a lot of things that parents can have in place in writing while they are relatively young and healthy.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[32:33] - Cameron has a lot of great resources on her website CameronHuddleston.com.</span></li> </ul> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Thanks for joining us on Easy Prey. Be sure to</span> <a href= "https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/easy-prey/id1488678905"><span style="font-weight: 400;"> subscribe to our podcast on iTunes</span></a> <span style= "font-weight: 400;">and leave a nice review. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Links and Resources:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.easyprey.com/"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Podcast Web Page</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.facebook.com/EasyPreyPodcast"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Facebook Page</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://whatismyipaddress.com/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">whatismyipaddress.com</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.instagram.com/easypreypodcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Instagram</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://twitter.com/easypreypodcast"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Twitter</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.linkedin.com/company/easy-prey-podcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on LinkedIn</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCgy_xKrjiXghSgGFEAFdTQ"><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Easy Prey on YouTube</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.pinterest.com/easypreypodcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Pinterest</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.getcarefull.com/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Carefull Website</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://cameronhuddleston.com/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Cameron Huddleston’s Website</span></a></li> </ul>]]></description>

			<title>Behind the Scenes of a Scammer Syndicate with Jack Whittaker</title>
			<itunes:title>Behind the Scenes of a Scammer Syndicate with Jack Whittaker</itunes:title>
			<pubDate>Wed, 14 Sep 2022 10:00:01 +0000</pubDate>
			<guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[ba318b89-a0ac-4796-8794-1a3e9f81cd00]]></guid>
			<link><![CDATA[https://www.easyprey.com/133]]></link>
			<description><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">On this podcast, we talk a lot about identifying and avoiding online fraud. But in this episode, our guest is going to share his experiences tracking down the individuals, syndicates, and criminal organizations behind pet scams, how they utilize freelancers, and how they launder their ill gotten gains. Today’s guest is Jack Whittaker. Jack is a Criminology PhD candidate with a specialization in published literature on online fraud. In addition, he has a proven track record of doing media interviews for local and national outlets, lectures, conference speaking, and promo consulting for policy think tanks. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Show Notes:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[0:54] - Welcome back to the show, Jack! Check out episode 103 with Jack on pet scams. 			<title>Payment App Scams with Michelle Couch-Friedman</title>
			<itunes:title>Payment App Scams with Michelle Couch-Friedman</itunes:title>
			<pubDate>Wed, 07 Sep 2022 10:00:37 +0000</pubDate>
			<guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[07ebec4b-2570-4a26-bb82-f6ff60ce90aa]]></guid>

			<description><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Venmo, CashApp, Zelle, and other payment apps are convenient for sending money to family and friends. But are they really safe to be using? Today’s guest is Michelle Couch-Friedman. Michelle is the founder and CEO of Consumer Rescue. She is an experienced consumer reporter, advocate, mediator, author, and licensed psychotherapist. Michelle has also been a columnist, contributing editor, and former executive director for Elliott Advocacy, a non-profit organization dedicated to consumer advocacy. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Show Notes:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[1:05] - Michelle explains her role within Consumer Rescue and the mission of the company.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[2:52] - About 7 years ago, Michelle had a negative consumer experience.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[5:12] - Her experience led to her journey in consumer advocacy.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[7:56] - Through Consumer Rescue, Michelle assists people in staying calm and logical. Stick with the facts and stand out with brevity.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[9:32] - Payment apps have become the preferred method for scammers worldwide.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[10:33] - Payment apps will not refund you your money if you are scammed.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[12:34] - Scammers set up websites that look professional and legitimate.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[13:32] - This is very common with purchasing pets online.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[14:35] - There are incremental steps to increase the amount of money sent.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[15:50] - The incremental steps are common in romance scams as well.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[16:51] - Michelle describes what a Chargeback scam is and how it began with Venmo, but shouldn’t work with Zelle.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[18:59] - Don’t send money back if you receive money by accident from a stranger.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[21:03] - There are safety nets in place to ensure accidents don’t happen. Don’t be hasty.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[22:42] - If you don’t use a payment app or don’t understand how to use it appropriately, don’t have it on your phone.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[24:35] - The apps are not a bank. They do not come with the same kind of protections.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[26:52] - Payment apps are never going to be the preferred method of payment from any legitimate company.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[28:27] - It is always a red flag when someone is trying to get you away from the website or legitimate platform.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[30:48] - Look closely at websites and reverse lookup images on Google.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[32:23] - Airbnb and vacation listings are common scams.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[34:31] - When it comes to property listings, there are steps you can take to ensure its legitimacy.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[36:37] - Alternatively, if something is listed underpriced, that could also be a red flag.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[39:29] - Airbnb began as shared space rentals only.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[41:10] - Make all your payments from the platform. Avoid third party payments.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[42:57] - Prevention is best. Once you’re in this situation, you are likely out of your money.</span></li> </ul> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Thanks for joining us on Easy Prey. Be sure to</span> <a href= "https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/easy-prey/id1488678905"><span style="font-weight: 400;"> subscribe to our podcast on iTunes</span></a> <span style= "font-weight: 400;">and leave a nice review. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Links and Resources:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.linkedin.com/company/easy-prey-podcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on LinkedIn</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: They do not come with the same kind of protections.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[26:52] - Payment apps are never going to be the preferred method of payment from any legitimate company.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[28:27] - It is always a red flag when someone is trying to get you away from the website or legitimate platform.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[30:48] - Look closely at websites and reverse lookup images on Google.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[32:23] - Airbnb and vacation listings are common scams.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[34:31] - When it comes to property listings, there are steps you can take to ensure its legitimacy.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[36:37] - Alternatively, if something is listed underpriced, that could also be a red flag.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[39:29] - Airbnb began as shared space rentals only.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[41:10] - Make all your payments from the platform. Avoid third party payments.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[42:57] - Prevention is best. Once you’re in this situation, you are likely out of your money.</li> </ul> <p>Thanks for joining us on Easy Prey. 			<title>Fighting Against Fraud with John Breyault</title>
			<itunes:title>Fighting Against Fraud with John Breyault</itunes:title>
			<pubDate>Wed, 31 Aug 2022 10:00:59 +0000</pubDate>
			<guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[931b845c-e56f-4832-bdad-33d1d213e638]]></guid>
			<link><![CDATA[https://www.easyprey.com/131]]></link>
			<description><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">With financial payment platforms used more regularly to exchange cash between individuals, scammers have become more creative in using them to defraud users. Today’s guest is John Breyault. John is the National Consumers League Vice President of Public Policy, Telecommunications, and Fraud. As the director of Fraud.org, John is a nationally recognized expert in fraud, with more than 17 years of experience in educating consumers in advocating for stronger consumer protections at the federal, state, and local levels. He is the author of Fraud.org’s monthly Fraud Alert emails and NCL’s bi-weekly Data Insecurity Digest. He has testified before Congress, federal regulatory agencies, and state legislatures dozens of times about fraud related topics. He is quoted regularly in the press about fraud including The New York Times, Wall Street Journal, and Washington Post.</span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Show Notes:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[1:10] - John shares his background and current roles with the National Consumers League.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[3:02] - John has been working in consumer advocacy for over 20 years.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[4:27] - What are peer to peer payment platforms? Venmo is the most commonly used.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[5:53] - The features of peer to peer payment platforms that are attractive to users are also attractive to scam artists.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[7:46] - John shares the trends in what scammers have been using to get money through Western Union, Green Dot cards, and gift cards.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[9:32] - More needs to be done to make security a priority.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[11:09] - John explains the difference between credit card transactions and peer to peer payment platforms.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[12:16] - With peer to peer platform fraud, banks can’t do anything about it due to a loophole in the law.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[13:38] - When this type of fraud is much more painful to experience than credit card fraud.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[14:44] - A huge appeal to these platforms is that they are free. But security needs to be improved.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[17:09] - There are a couple of regulations related to the connection of Venmo to a bank account.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[19:19] - The responsibility has been put on users and victims to monitor and fight back against fraud.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[21:47] - Scammers are very adept at creating a sense of urgency.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[23:38] - John shares an example of how this sense of urgency can fool anyone.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[24:34] - Cryptocurrency is the next focus of attention for those trying to prevent fraud.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[26:40] - These trends tend to follow a pattern.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[28:09] - One of the problems in tracking scam trends is the way data is collected.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[29:23] - We need to change how we talk about fraud victims.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[31:28] - Scams are run as a business these days, which make them much more convincing than in the past.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[34:15] - With most overseas scams, the likelihood of getting your money back is slim.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[35:50] - As a business, think about how you can make peer to peer payment apps as safe as possible?</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[37:35] - John shares an example of Venmo transactions that are protected and those that are not.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[40:07] - A legitimate business will accept payment in other ways than only peer to peer apps.</span></li> </ul> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Thanks for joining us on Easy Prey. Be sure to</span> <a href= "https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/easy-prey/id1488678905"><span style="font-weight: 400;"> subscribe to our podcast on iTunes</span></a> <span style= "font-weight: 			<title>Tips to Avoid Insurance Fraud with Tony Royall</title>
			<itunes:title>Tips to Avoid Insurance Fraud with Tony Royall</itunes:title>
			<pubDate>Wed, 24 Aug 2022 10:00:07 +0000</pubDate>
			<guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[433c4d1b-c4fd-4f81-ac58-553aa64dfbb0]]></guid>
			<link><![CDATA[https://www.easyprey.com/130]]></link>
			<description><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Predators look to take advantage of people during the roughest situations of life. A perpetrator of insurance fraud makes a career out of milking the system thinking it's a victimless crime. Today’s guest is Officer Tony Royall. Officer Royall started in the Virginia Department of State Police in 1986. He worked in Accident Reproduction and then became an agent in Narcotics. Officer Royall has now been working in Insurance Fraud for the past 22 years.</span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Show Notes:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[0:47] - Officer Royall shares his background in law enforcement.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[2:24] - Over the years, there have been a lot of wild insurance fraud cases for Officer Royall. He describes a recent one that had an unexpected twist.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[4:47] - How was this insurance fraud discovered?</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[7:18] - One of the most prevalent insurance fraud situations is staged auto accidents.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[9:01] - Officer Royall describes another case and what the result was for the perpetrator staging accidents and fabricating medical bills.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[11:15] - Investigations are geared toward the people who intentionally commit crime.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[12:55] - Staged accidents that are insurance fraud are usually committed by multiple people working in tandem.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[13:59] - Officer Royall explains another type of insurance fraud case involving a staged slip and fall accident.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[15:59] - Sometimes people take the opportunity to purposefully stage an accident in a public place.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[17:54] - With every case of insurance fraud, premiums for everyone else could go up.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[19:53] - There are times when the police are contacted by insurance agencies, but are mostly contacted about insurance fraud by possible victims.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[21:18] - Always make sure your policy is up to date and periodically check on things to be sure it’s active.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[22:13] - Read the policy and what is covered. </span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[23:14] - Keep an inventory of high ticket items in your home and business including serial numbers. Documentation is extremely helpful in the event of fraud.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[25:20] - Catastrophic events create opportunities for perpetrators trying to solicit.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[26:15] - If you find yourself in an automobile accident, take photos of the damage of both cars and document details.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[28:02] - How can you document details of an accident?</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[29:21] - Be diligent and make as much information known as possible.</span></li> </ul> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Thanks for joining us on Easy Prey. Be sure to</span> <a href= "https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/easy-prey/id1488678905"><span style="font-weight: 400;"> subscribe to our podcast on iTunes</span></a> <span style= "font-weight: 400;">and leave a nice review. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Links and Resources:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.easyprey.com/"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Podcast Web Page</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.facebook.com/EasyPreyPodcast"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Facebook Page</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://whatismyipaddress.com/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">whatismyipaddress.com</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.instagram.com/easypreypodcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Instagram</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://twitter.com/easypreypodcast"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Twitter</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.linkedin.com/company/easy-prey-podcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on LinkedIn</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCgy_xKrjiXghSgGFEAFdTQ"><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Easy Prey on YouTube</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.pinterest.com/easypreypodcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Pinterest</span></a></li> </ul>]]></description>

Officer Royall started in the Virginia Department of State Police in 1986. He worked in Accident Reproduction and then became an agent in Narcotics. Officer Royall has now been working in Insurance Fraud for the past 22 years.</p> Show Notes: <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[0:47] - Officer Royall shares his background in law enforcement.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[2:24] - Over the years, there have been a lot of wild insurance fraud cases for Officer Royall. He describes a recent one that had an unexpected twist.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[4:47] - How was this insurance fraud discovered?</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[7:18] - One of the most prevalent insurance fraud situations is staged auto accidents.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[9:01] - Officer Royall describes another case and what the result was for the perpetrator staging accidents and fabricating medical bills.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[11:15] - Investigations are geared toward the people who intentionally commit crime.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[12:55] - Staged accidents that are insurance fraud are usually committed by multiple people working in tandem.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[13:59] - Officer Royall explains another type of insurance fraud case involving a staged slip and fall accident.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[15:59] - Sometimes people take the opportunity to purposefully stage an accident in a public place.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[17:54] - With every case of insurance fraud, premiums for everyone else could go up.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[19:53] - There are times when the police are contacted by insurance agencies, but are mostly contacted about insurance fraud by possible victims.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[21:18] - Always make sure your policy is up to date and periodically check on things to be sure it’s active.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[22:13] - Read the policy and what is covered. </li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[23:14] - Keep an inventory of high ticket items in your home and business including serial numbers. Documentation is extremely helpful in the event of fraud.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[25:20] - Catastrophic events create opportunities for perpetrators trying to solicit.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[26:15] - If you find yourself in an automobile accident, take photos of the damage of both cars and document details.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[28:02] - How can you document details of an accident?</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[29:21] - Be diligent and make as much information known as possible.</li> </ul> <p>Thanks for joining us on Easy Prey. Be sure to <a href= "https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/easy-prey/id1488678905"> subscribe to our podcast on iTunes</a> and leave a nice review. </p> Links and Resources: <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.easyprey.com/">Podcast Web Page</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.facebook.com/EasyPreyPodcast">Facebook Page</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://whatismyipaddress.com/">whatismyipaddress.com</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.instagram.com/easypreypodcast/">Easy Prey on Instagram</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://twitter.com/easypreypodcast">Easy Prey on Twitter</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.linkedin.com/company/easy-prey-podcast/">Easy Prey on LinkedIn</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCgy_xKrjiXghSgGFEAFdTQ"> Easy Prey on YouTube</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.pinterest.com/easypreypodcast/">Easy Prey on Pinterest</a></li> </ul>]]></content:encoded>

		<item>
			<title>Cyberbullying with Dr. Robin Kowalski</title>
			<itunes:title>Cyberbullying with Dr. Robin Kowalski</itunes:title>
			<pubDate>Wed, 17 Aug 2022 10:00:18 +0000</pubDate>
			<guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[8fb1a76e-78e7-404e-9930-026e058e0554]]></guid>
			<link><![CDATA[https://www.easyprey.com/129]]></link>
			<description><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">The instinct to respond immediately to incorrect, negative, or hurtful comments online almost seems to be hardwired. How we respond can lead to unintended detrimental consequences and lead us down a dark path. </span></p> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Today’s guest is Dr. Robin Kowalski. Dr. Kowalski is a professor of Psychology at Clemson University. She obtained her PhD in Social Psychology from the University of North Carolina Greensboro. Her research interests focus primarily on adverse interpersonal behaviors, most notably complaining, teasing, and bullying with a particular focus on cyberbullying. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Show Notes:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[0:57] - Welcome to the show, Dr. Kowalski! She shares her focus on cyberbullying and how she found herself interested in this research.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[2:27] - Traditional bullying is intended and repeated aggressive behavior. Cyberbullying is similar but there are some differences.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[4:24] - Perceived anonymity in the online world gives bullies a great deal of power.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[5:42] - People who are involved in traditional bullying tend to also participate in cyberbullying.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[7:05] - There are many different reasons why someone bullies another either traditionally or virtually.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[9:18] - In the virtual world, anyone can be a victim and anyone can be a perpetrator.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[10:31] - Cyberbullying can take several different forms.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[11:56] - If it happens once, simply walk away and don’t respond. But what happens if it keeps happening?</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[13:10] - Young people may not want to be honest with their parents out of fear that their technology might be taken away from them.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[15:29] - The feelings involved with cyberbullying range from anxiety to suicidal ideation.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[17:22] - Academic issues become a problem as well, even though cyberbullying takes place off of school grounds.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[18:58] - Robin describes “mattering” and how this can impact youth in school.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[20:38] - Social isolation is a warning sign for a lot of things. Parents need to be on the lookout and open up lines of communication.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[22:40] - Anonymous reporting needs to be present, effective, and people need to be educated.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[23:51] - Cyberbullying is not limited to youth. It happens in the workplace as well.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[26:47] - Through Covid-19, prevalence rates did not change as much as Robin expected.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[29:15] - If we receive something negative, Robin advises to pause before responding emotionally.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[30:55] - There’s such a familiarity with technology that it has become normalized to cyberbullying.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[32:57] - Suicide is a possible and horrible result of cyberbullying.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[35:05] - There’s a more permanent feeling to cyberbullying.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[36:32] - Employers can also search for evidence of behavior patterns in potential employees.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[38:57] - Education is key and victims speaking out about their experience helps people understand the impact.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[41:42] - Robin shares about a time she experienced some level of cyberbullying.</span></li> </ul> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Thanks for joining us on Easy Prey. Be sure to</span> <a href= "https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/easy-prey/id1488678905"><span style="font-weight: 400;"> subscribe to our podcast on iTunes</span></a> <span style= "font-weight: 400;">and leave a nice review. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Links and Resources:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.easyprey.com/"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Podcast Web Page</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.facebook.com/EasyPreyPodcast"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Facebook Page</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://whatismyipaddress.com/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">whatismyipaddress.com</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.instagram.com/easypreypodcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Instagram</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://twitter.com/easypreypodcast"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Twitter</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.linkedin.com/company/easy-prey-podcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on LinkedIn</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCgy_xKrjiXghSgGFEAFdTQ"><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Easy Prey on YouTube</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.pinterest.com/easypreypodcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Pinterest</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.clemson.edu/cbshs/about/profiles/index.html?userid=RKOWALS"> <span style="font-weight: 400;">Clemson University - Dr. Robin Kowalski</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B007BGZL5K/ref=dbs_a_def_rwt_hsch_vapi_tkin_p1_i0"> <em>Cyberbullying: Bullying in the Digital Age</em> by Dr. Robin Kowalski</a></li> </ul>]]></description>

		<item>
			<title>Smishing is the New SPAM with Giulia Porter</title>
			<itunes:title>Smishing is the New SPAM with Giulia Porter</itunes:title>
			<pubDate>Wed, 10 Aug 2022 10:00:14 +0000</pubDate>
			<guid isPermaLink="false"><![CDATA[42e21fa7-5d81-48b7-86d4-e69c9eb890f8]]></guid>
			<link><![CDATA[https://www.easyprey.com/128]]></link>
			<description><![CDATA[<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Smishing texts have increased over 60% in just one year. With scammers spoofing caller ID, how can you trust</span> <em><span style= "font-weight: 400;">any</span></em> <span style= "font-weight: 400;">communication coming onto your phone? Today’s guest is Giulia Porter. Giulia is the Vice President of RoboKiller, the app that eliminates 99% of spam calls. Since 2017, Giulia has been leading RoboKiller’s vision to create a world without spam calls. And now more recently with spam texts, they’ve introduced Text Killer. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Show Notes:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[1:04] - Giulia shares her background and why she was led to a career with cyber security.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[2:24] - Caller ID spoofing is when a scammer changes what number comes up on your phone when they call. There is also neighbor spoofing.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[4:30] - Technology has allowed scammers to call from any number, including your own.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[5:54] - Scammers try to stay ahead of trends.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[6:30] - Stir/Shaken is a framework designed to help stop spam call problems.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[8:12] - Most United States phone providers did implement this.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[10:10] - Giulia explains how this framework works and some of the pitfalls it has.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[12:08] - As of May, we are at about 6.5 billion estimated spam calls in the United States per day. About 35-40% of those use caller ID spoofing.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[13:19] - Spam texts are on the rise having experienced a 60% increase in one year.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[15:01] - Text Killer tries to distinguish between spam and unwanted texts.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[16:21] - Giulia describes a court case against Facebook that changed the landscape of notification texts.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[18:01] - Some people have a “burner phone” with a separate number that they use for accounts that require a phone number.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[21:03] - Giulia shares some of the scams that were trending in the last couple of years and what scammers were targeting.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[22:20] - In 2022, there has been an increase in illicit spam texts.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[24:27] - Don’t tap links in texts or reply to them. Delete the text.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[26:18] - Thinking about your phone number in a more serious way is a way to be more aware of how many people have access to it.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[27:56] - Chris shares something you can do about your personally identifiable information online.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[29:20] - RoboKiller and Text Killer use AI and machine learning to analyze calls and texts to stop them from reaching you.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[30:50] - You can talk to your carrier to find what protection they offer.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[32:01] - Another concern is lobbyists paying providers to have select campaign texts to come through.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[33:13] - You can report spam texts and notify your carrier.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[34:52] - How does Robo and Text Killer make sure the numbers and texts that are blocked are accurate?</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[38:12] - RoboKiller has to work with different providers and that creates challenges when they all function slightly differently.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[40:38] - The next wave of scams are through apps like WhatsApp and Messenger.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[43:12] - Organizations need to also consider how much they lose to scams posing as them.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">[45:12] - RoboKiller is available online as well in the app store on iPhones and Android. There are free services and premium.</span></li> </ul> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Thanks for joining us on Easy Prey. Be sure to</span> <a href= "https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/easy-prey/id1488678905"><span style="font-weight: 400;"> subscribe to our podcast on iTunes</span></a> <span style= "font-weight: 400;">and leave a nice review. </span></p> <h3><span style="font-weight: 400;">Links and Resources:</span></h3> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.easyprey.com/"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Podcast Web Page</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.facebook.com/EasyPreyPodcast"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Facebook Page</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://whatismyipaddress.com/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">whatismyipaddress.com</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.instagram.com/easypreypodcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Instagram</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://twitter.com/easypreypodcast"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Twitter</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.linkedin.com/company/easy-prey-podcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on LinkedIn</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCgy_xKrjiXghSgGFEAFdTQ"><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Easy Prey on YouTube</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.pinterest.com/easypreypodcast/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">Easy Prey on Pinterest</span></a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.robokiller.com/"><span style= "font-weight: 400;">RoboKiller Website</span></a></li> </ul>]]></description>
			<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Smishing texts have increased over 60% in just one year. With scammers spoofing caller ID, how can you trust <em>any</em> communication coming onto your phone? Today’s guest is Giulia Porter. Giulia is the Vice President of RoboKiller, the app that eliminates 99% of spam calls. Since 2017, Giulia has been leading RoboKiller’s vision to create a world without spam calls. And now more recently with spam texts, they’ve introduced Text Killer. </p> Show Notes: <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[1:04] - Giulia shares her background and why she was led to a career with cyber security.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[2:24] - Caller ID spoofing is when a scammer changes what number comes up on your phone when they call. There is also neighbor spoofing.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[4:30] - Technology has allowed scammers to call from any number, including your own.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[5:54] - Scammers try to stay ahead of trends.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[6:30] - Stir/Shaken is a framework designed to help stop spam call problems.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[8:12] - Most United States phone providers did implement this.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[10:10] - Giulia explains how this framework works and some of the pitfalls it has.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[12:08] - As of May, we are at about 6.5 billion estimated spam calls in the United States per day. About 35-40% of those use caller ID spoofing.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[13:19] - Spam texts are on the rise having experienced a 60% increase in one year.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[15:01] - Text Killer tries to distinguish between spam and unwanted texts.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[16:21] - Giulia describes a court case against Facebook that changed the landscape of notification texts.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[18:01] - Some people have a “burner phone” with a separate number that they use for accounts that require a phone number.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[21:03] - Giulia shares some of the scams that were trending in the last couple of years and what scammers were targeting.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[22:20] - In 2022, there has been an increase in illicit spam texts.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[24:27] - Don’t tap links in texts or reply to them. Delete the text.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[26:18] - Thinking about your phone number in a more serious way is a way to be more aware of how many people have access to it.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[27:56] - Chris shares something you can do about your personally identifiable information online.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[29:20] - RoboKiller and Text Killer use AI and machine learning to analyze calls and texts to stop them from reaching you.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[30:50] - You can talk to your carrier to find what protection they offer.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[32:01] - Another concern is lobbyists paying providers to have select campaign texts to come through.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[33:13] - You can report spam texts and notify your carrier.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[34:52] - How does Robo and Text Killer make sure the numbers and texts that are blocked are accurate?</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[38:12] - RoboKiller has to work with different providers and that creates challenges when they all function slightly differently.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[40:38] - The next wave of scams are through apps like WhatsApp and Messenger.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[43:12] - Organizations need to also consider how much they lose to scams posing as them.</li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1">[45:12] - RoboKiller is available online as well in the app store on iPhones and Android. There are free services and premium.</li> </ul> <p>Thanks for joining us on Easy Prey. Be sure to <a href= "https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/easy-prey/id1488678905"> subscribe to our podcast on iTunes</a> and leave a nice review. </p> Links and Resources: <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.easyprey.com/">Podcast Web Page</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.facebook.com/EasyPreyPodcast">Facebook Page</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://whatismyipaddress.com/">whatismyipaddress.com</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.instagram.com/easypreypodcast/">Easy Prey on Instagram</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://twitter.com/easypreypodcast">Easy Prey on Twitter</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.linkedin.com/company/easy-prey-podcast/">Easy Prey on LinkedIn</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCgy_xKrjiXghSgGFEAFdTQ"> Easy Prey on YouTube</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.pinterest.com/easypreypodcast/">Easy Prey on Pinterest</a></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;" aria-level="1"><a href= "https://www.robokiller.com/">RoboKiller Website</a></li> </ul>]]></content:encoded>
